item.description:
Dr. Allan Hughes will be on the phone tomorrow night for another teleseminar: Our Mind's Desires.



Allan will talk about what our mind wants, what our soul wants, and how we find out the difference between the two.

This is a teleseminar, which means all you have to do is pick up the phone at 8pm and dial in. The call-in number is: 1.712.432.3900. When prompted, enter your access code: 1617505 followed by the # sign.
Hope to see (hear) you there!

group.name: The Science of Spirituality Meditation Meetup

item.name: Our Mind's Desires
